gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
Purple Mountain in suburbs of Nanjing, with Ming tombs and Sun Yat-sen's mausoleum

definition: Zijin county in Heyuan 河源[He2 yuan2], Guangdong
(bird species of China) violet cuckoo (Chrysococcyx xanthorhynchus)

sentences.english: There's an observatory on Mt. Zijin.
sentences.chinese: 這南京紫金山上就有一座天文臺。

sentences.english: The mountain you see to the right is the Purple Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 山上看到你的權利是紫金山。

sentences.english: Objective To study the killing effect of Zijin powder extract on human osteosarcoma cells.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討中藥紫金散對人骨肉瘤細胞的殺傷作用。

sentences.english: The Zijin mining group had been discharging untreated water into the Tingjiang River for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 紫金礦業長期以來向汀江排放未經處理的廢水。

sentences.english: Seen from the pagoda, the south foot of the Purple Mountain is a sea of trees.
sentences.chinese: 從這個塔上遠眺，紫金山南麓是樹的海洋。

sentences.english: It's difficult for me to climb PurpleMountain, but he climbs it every day.
sentences.chinese: 很難，我爬上紫金山，但他爬它的每一天。

sentences.english: Pharmaceutical plants of genus Ardisia in eastern China.
sentences.chinese: 我國華東地區紫金牛屬藥用植物的整理鑑定。

sentences.english: New species and varieties of Myrsinaceae from China.
sentences.chinese: 中國紫金牛科新種及新變種。

sentences.english: Dispersed Yang Xiong energy, side Ying Lian pilfer gets violet gold luminous crock.
sentences.chinese: 分散了楊雄精力，側應蓮兒盜得紫金夜光壺。

sentences.english: The design of Neoclassicism pursues perfectness in every project and case.
sentences.chinese: 紫金尚古設計追求每個項目，每個案例做到精益求精。

sentences.english: This thesis takes the lightning accident in ZiJin Temple of Suzhou as an example.
sentences.chinese: 本文以蘇州紫金庵遭雷擊事故爲案例。

sentences.english: This paper describes an integrating photometer built at Purple Mountain Observatory recently.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹紫金山天文臺直流積分型光度計。

sentences.english: Zijinshan deposit is a large scale copper-gold deposit that was discovered in coastal area of SE china.
sentences.chinese: 紫金山礦牀是我國東南沿海發現的大型金銅礦牀。

sentences.english: They are now preparing to apply for a Guinness record.
sentences.chinese: 紫金繡莊目前正準備爲這面黨旗申報吉尼斯世界紀錄。

sentences.english: New species and taxonomic changes in Ardisia Swartz from China.
sentences.chinese: 中國紫金牛屬新種和分類上的更動。

sentences.english: Great Wall of Nanking and Purple Mountain, China.
sentences.chinese: 偉大的南京城牆與紫金山。
